metadata.description: Official itsokay-co Claude Code plugin marketplace

plugins.name: code-review
plugins.description: Automated code review for pull requests using multiple specialized agents with confidence-based scoring

plugins.name: commit-commands
plugins.description: Streamline your git workflow with simple commands for committing, pushing, and creating pull requests

plugins.name: feature-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive feature development workflow with specialized agents for codebase exploration, architecture design, and quality review

plugins.name: pr-review-toolkit
plugins.description: Comprehensive PR review agents specializing in comments, tests, error handling, type design, code quality, and code simplification

plugins.name: ralph-wiggum
plugins.description: Implementation of the Ralph Wiggum technique - continuous self-referential AI loops for interactive iterative development

plugins.name: security-guidance
plugins.description: Security reminder hook that warns about potential security issues when editing files

plugins.name: frontend-design
plugins.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.

plugins.name: gemini-tools
plugins.description: Gemini 3 Pro for visual analysis, UI/UX work, and image generation

plugins.name: codex
plugins.description: Launch OpenAI Codex for software architecture analysis and research

plugins.name: dns
plugins.description: Manage DNS records via provider APIs (Spaceship, GoDaddy)

plugins.name: headless
plugins.description: Headless browser automation for site comparison and E2E testing

plugins.name: mobile
plugins.description: Native mobile app testing - E2E and cross-platform parity

plugins.name: project
plugins.description: Session workflow commands for multi-agent development - start, end, sync, health, PR, worktree
